data.text: @SirSeaside @PollyannaRabbit It is a little black one if that helps.
@SirSeaside It will blow east. Just don't buy any products from east of there

@JynxPrado @zUHorwyREkpG3fr @Sunshin28412253 @SirSeaside @JynxPrado the problem is that perhaps US and West made mistake not this year but some years ago. I do not agree with all what is said here https://t.co/jQaTyAikMt but some arguments make sense.
@lucymiaoly @Sunshin28412253 @SirSeaside U.S want profits, Russia wants obedience,dictatorship
@Sunshin28412253 @SirSeaside You are not Ukrainian, you do not need to take up arms, you can certainly express your opinion here

@SirSeaside https://t.co/RTKG0znYkR
Российский шпион КПК, в настоящее время во Львове.

@zUHorwyREkpG3fr @Sunshin28412253 @SirSeaside What different does it make if you're Russian or not?

Ukraine getting weapons from the West doesn't justify Russia's aggression. Though the attacks since 2014 are why they've been getting weapons.

@KDovhan @SirSeaside So Ukraine and Russia should be left alone to negotiate a solution, and Russia would not just make a decision that serious. If the U.S. as a bystander has been provoking Russia to mention a world war, then if Russia does do something, won't innocent people be the ones injured?

@Sunshin28412253 @SirSeaside The United States has really provoked a lot of wars, hiding behind the scenes to make money from wars, all of which are negotiating peace, but some countries are sending weapons
